messages.message:
Hiring Event for Rockstar Games - San Diego, CA
alec.mckinley@andiamogo.com
I would love to work for a video game company!  I have mind games designed for you.  When can we start?
I am totally serious.  Here is a riddle:  I am science.  I will spend my entire life trying to prove that there is no such thing as coincidence.  Who am I and how would I reveal myself?
